Record.referencing_names: REFERENCING NEW AS NEW OLD AS OLD
Record.description: "PPM"."PRTASK_UPD_TRG1" AFTER INSERT OR UPDATE OF PRPCTCOMPLETE ON PRTASK REFERENCING NEW AS NEW OLD AS OLD FOR EACH ROW
Record.trigger_body:
DECLARE v_exist number := 0; BEGIN SELECT count(*) INTO v_exist FROM EVM_TASK_COMPLETION WHERE :new.PRID = EVM_TASK_COMPLETION.TASK_ID AND trunc(SYSDATE) - trunc(EVM_TASK_COMPLETION.EFFECTIVE_DATE) < 1;
IF INSERTING OR v_exist = 0 THEN INSERT INTO EVM_TASK_COMPLETION ( PROJECT_ID ,TASK_ID ,EFFECTIVE_DATE ,PRPCTCOMPLETE ) VALUES ( :new.PRPROJECTID ,:new.PRID ,trunc(SYSDATE) ,:new.PRPCTCOMPLETE ); ELSE UPDATE EVM_TASK_COMPLETION SET EVM_TASK_COMPLETION.PRPCTCOMPLETE = :new.PRPCTCOMPLETE WHERE TASK_ID = :new.PRID AND trunc(SYSDATE) - trunc(EVM_TASK_COMPLETION.EFFECTIVE_DATE) < 1; END IF; END;
